de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.plugins

Class Abstract4diacPluginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.velasolaris.plugin.controller.spi.AbstractPluginController
      • de.htw.berlin.polysun4diac.plugins.Abstract4diacPluginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPluginController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSingleComponentController

    public abstract class Abstract4diacPluginController
extends AbstractPluginController
    Abstract class for Polysun PluginControllers that communicate with 4diac IEC 61499 applications running on 4diac-RTE (FORTE). If more than one controllers are used, it is recommended to set up the socket as a TCP client.
    Author:
    Marc Jakobi

    HTW Berlin

    July 2017
    See Also:
    CommLayerParams, IForteSocket, IPluginController

        Description copied from interface: IPluginController
        Determines the GUI properties which must be hidden in the current configuration. E.g. if the flowrate is not fixed, the Fixflowrate property must be hidden.

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        parameters - Generic parameters
        Returns:
